food-000.name: Caramel Apple
food-000.desc: Caramel apples or toffee apples are whole apples covered in a layer of caramel. They're one of the main sweets of every seasonal event in the wizarding world.

food-001.name: Beer
food-001.desc: Aint nothing like a good beer.

misc-000.name: Scroll
misc-000.desc: An scroll that is used to write things on it. Nothing is special about this scroll.
